patthana14.19:4.1: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana14.19:4.3: ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana14.19:4.5: oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana14.19:4.7: yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana14.19:4.9: nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.19:5.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
